text: Jong Kwang-bom (born 29 July 2001) is a North Korean short track speed skater. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. In the 2018 Winter Olympics, Jong slipped in the start of the 500m heats and tripped over Japanese speed skater Keita Watanabe. Also after restarting the race, Jong bumped into Watanabe before tumbling on the ice.http://www.newsweek.com/did-north-korean-speed- skater-just-try-take-down-his-japanese-rival-814059 ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:North Korean male short track speed skaters Category:Olympic short track speed skaters of North Korea Category:Short track speed skaters at the 2018 Winter Olympics
title: Jong Kwang-bom
